default_operations.name: CSO-00002
default_operations.details: Tag instrument, verify customer notes, confirm play state. Protect finish and posts; install key clamps as needed.
default_operations.work_instructions: Gloves on. Bench mat in place. Photograph current condition. Note missing/loose parts. Verify serial.
default_operations.safety_notes: Eye protection during compressed air and solvents.
default_operations.qc_target: All keys move freely; no immediate binding or loose posts.

default_operations.details: Baseline leak-light and suction check to guide work.
default_operations.work_instructions: Leak-light pass tone-hole by tone-hole; annotate leaks. Gentle suction test per stack.
default_operations.qc_target: Document baseline leaks; proceed to correction steps.

default_operations.details: Inspect cork integrity, fit, and alignment. Correct high spots; ensure airtight fit.
default_operations.work_instructions: Blue/graphite transfer for high-spot mapping; dress lightly. Confirm smooth rotation and full seat.
default_operations.safety_notes: Cut away from hand; dust control for cork.
default_operations.qc_target: Airtight at joint; smooth on/off; zero wobble.
default_operations.qc_tolerance: No detectable leak with suction/light test.

default_operations.details: Same as above; verify bridge alignment and key interaction.
default_operations.work_instructions: Fit cork, check axial play; verify bridge keys clear and align.
default_operations.safety_notes: Mind bridge key tips during assembly.
default_operations.qc_target: Airtight; smooth seat; precise bridge alignment.

default_operations.details: Fit and seal bell tenon cork; confirm bell resonance not damped by over-tight fit.
default_operations.work_instructions: Size cork, light dress, confirm seat depth.
default_operations.qc_target: Free bell resonance; no buzz; airtight.

default_operations.details: Inspect rims for chips, divots, raised grain; correct.
default_operations.work_instructions: Dust+adhesive micro-fill as needed; burnish; re-true rim; verify flat with straightedge/dye.
default_operations.qc_target: Uniform pad print; no light at full close.

default_operations.details: Same inspection/correction for lower joint.
default_operations.work_instructions: As above; pay special attention to long E/B, F/C, F♯/C♯, and A♭/E♭ holes.
default_operations.qc_target: Uniform pad print; no light.

default_operations.details: Minimal corrective ream to remove varnish/ridge and restore true rim; avoid diameter drift.
default_operations.work_instructions: Use correctly sized pilot/reamer; 1–2 light passes; re-check pad contact.
default_operations.safety_notes: Stop if diameter change measurably affects pitch.
default_operations.qc_target: Rim true; original vent maintained.
default_operations.qc_tolerance: No >0.1 mm change in effective vent.

default_operations.details: Detect & seal micro-leaks at chimney interface; re-dress rim.
default_operations.work_instructions: Dye test; wick thin sealant; cure; re-true rim lightly; re-check with light/suction.
default_operations.qc_target: No leak at chimney after cure.

default_operations.details: True cups, float/seat pads, set pad angles for full seal.
default_operations.work_instructions: Check cup plane; shim/float; heat-seat evenly; verify uniform impression.
default_operations.safety_notes: Heat control to avoid pad damage.
default_operations.qc_target: No light; negative pressure hold ≥3 s per close.

default_operations.details: As above for lower joint pads including linked closures.
default_operations.work_instructions: Float and seat; coordinate linked key closures (e.g., long B/F).
default_operations.qc_target: No light; negative pressure hold ≥3 s.

default_operations.details: Set vent heights for balance of response/intonation; verify twelfths.
default_operations.work_instructions: Set travel stops; measure with feeler gauges; play-check open G–A–B♭ and twelfths.
default_operations.qc_target: Even venting; typical 0.9–1.1 mm for throat group (model dependent).
default_operations.qc_tolerance: ±0.1 mm within group; twelfths within ±5 cents.

default_operations.details: Set stack heights and linked closures for evenness and stable twelfths.
default_operations.work_instructions: Balance heights across RH stack; confirm long B/F linkage does not over-vent.
default_operations.qc_target: Even venting across RH stack for smooth scale.
default_operations.qc_tolerance: ±0.1 mm within group; twelfths within ±5 cents.

default_operations.details: Balance return force for speed with minimal finger load.
default_operations.work_instructions: Measure with gram gauge; match neighboring keys; remove coil stress points.
default_operations.qc_target: Uniform feel; typical LH stack ~30–45 gf.

default_operations.details: Balance long key return vs link friction; ensure positive close.
default_operations.work_instructions: Gauge and match; ensure linked closures do not lag.
default_operations.qc_target: Uniform feel; typical RH stack/long keys ~35–55 gf.

default_operations.details: Replace register cork with beveled geometry for silent closure and stable vent.
default_operations.work_instructions: Select proper density; cut bevel for glide; cement, cure, final dress to spec height.
default_operations.qc_target: Register pad gap/vent per model spec; silent actuation.
default_operations.qc_tolerance: No audible thump; gap repeats within ±0.1 mm.

default_operations.details: Re-verify pad impressions after height/spring/cork changes.
default_operations.work_instructions: Leak-light + suction; correct micro leaks.
default_operations.qc_target: Zero light on all upper pads.

default_operations.details: Same verification for lower joint.
default_operations.work_instructions: Leak-light + suction; correct micro leaks.
default_operations.qc_target: Zero light on all lower pads.

default_operations.details: Oil pivots/rods, treat felts/corks, eliminate clicks.
default_operations.work_instructions: Tiny oil on bearings only; wipe excess; confirm silence.
default_operations.qc_target: Silent action; free return.
default_operations.qc_tolerance: No audible mechanical noise at mezzo-forte fingerings.

default_operations.details: Full assembled leak test to confirm global seal.
default_operations.work_instructions: Leak-light sweep; suction per stack; correct any regression.
default_operations.qc_target: Zero light across instrument; stable holds.
default_operations.qc_tolerance: Holds negative pressure ≥3 s per group.

default_operations.details: Confirm A4 reference and twelfths; micro-adjust heights if needed.
default_operations.work_instructions: Tune at A=440/442 per shop standard; check twelfths and throat notes for balance.
default_operations.safety_notes: Hearing protection if using sustained tones.
default_operations.qc_target: A4 within ±5 cents at target pitch; twelfths balanced.

default_operations.details: Full scale, articulation, interval slurs; document QC.
default_operations.work_instructions: Slow/fast scales, pp–ff, side-key trills; document results and any advisories.
default_operations.qc_target: Even response and clean articulation across range.
default_operations.qc_tolerance: No sticking; no mechanical noise; stable scale.

checklist_items.name: SCI-00002
checklist_items.notes: Acclimate case for ≥4 hours at 45–55% RH before opening.
Inspect wood and keywork; document pad/cork condition; upload photos.
Assemble dry; classify fits; log each joint.
14 days, 20–30 min/day; swab thoroughly after each use.
Light coat only; avoid pads; remove excess after rest.
Premium cork; sand to precise diameter; log measurements.
Float pads parallel; verify seal with feeler gauge.
Measure and adjust to A-clarinet targets.
Linked mechanisms close in perfect synchrony.
Map intonation tendencies across full range.
Compile logs, data, photos for client report.

checklist_items.task: Complete Final Documentation and Client Handover
checklist_items.notes: Ensure all logs, photos, and certificates are ready for client.
Gather feedback, assess performance, and identify improvements.

template_tasks.name: CTT-00002
template_tasks.subject: 0.1 Create Work Order
template_tasks.description: Open work order; scope, due date, client notes.

template_tasks.subject: 0.2 Visual Triage & Safety Check
template_tasks.description: Immediate risk screen; structural/keywork issues.

template_tasks.subject: 0.3 Intake Inventory & Photos
template_tasks.description: Inventory accessories; serials; high-res photos.

template_tasks.subject: 0.4 Player Profile & Preferences
template_tasks.description: Back-pressure, pitch standard (A=440/441), articulation.

template_tasks.subject: 0.5 Parts Availability Check
template_tasks.description: Confirm pads, corks, felts, adhesives availability.

template_tasks.subject: 1.1 Prep Environment & Start Data Log
template_tasks.description: Stabilize temperature/RH; start environmental logger.

template_tasks.subject: 1.2 Acclimatize Instrument
template_tasks.description: Acclimatization window prior to diagnostics.

template_tasks.subject: 1.3 Wood Moisture/Condition Note
template_tasks.description: Assess moisture/condition; note risks.

template_tasks.subject: 2.1 Tenon Fit (No Grease) — Baseline
template_tasks.description: Dry-fit feel, lateral play, pull-out force baseline.

template_tasks.subject: 2.2 Bore & Tone-Hole Map
template_tasks.description: Borescope; map tone-hole flatness/finish; note variances.

template_tasks.subject: 2.3 Keywork Survey
template_tasks.description: Check endplay/sideplay; bent keys/rods; fasteners.

template_tasks.subject: 2.4 Pad & Spring Condition
template_tasks.description: Per-key pad type/condition; spring material/condition.

template_tasks.subject: 2.5 Airtightness (Baseline)
template_tasks.description: Method + reading; locate/record leaks.

template_tasks.subject: 2.6 Quick Intonation Pass
template_tasks.description: Reference pitch set; sketch initial pitch tendencies.

template_tasks.subject: 2.7 Parts/Risk Finalization & Client OK
template_tasks.description: Finalize parts list/risks; client approval before invasive work.

template_tasks.subject: 3.1 Disassembly & Cleaning
template_tasks.description: Systematic teardown; clean; tray/label sub-assemblies.

template_tasks.subject: 3.2 Keywork Truing & Play Control
template_tasks.description: Straighten keys/rods; swedge/re-tube; set end/sideplay.

template_tasks.subject: 3.3 Tone-Hole Flatting/Chamfering
template_tasks.description: Correct tone-hole surfaces while preserving geometry.

template_tasks.subject: 3.4 Tenon Corks (Replace/Refit)
template_tasks.description: Install premium corks; sand to spec; log diameters.

template_tasks.subject: 3.5 Pad Selection & Installation
template_tasks.description: Select/install pads; float/seat; verify seal.

template_tasks.subject: 3.6 Springing & Regulation
template_tasks.description: Adjust spring tensions to A-clarinet gram-force targets; synchronize linkages.

template_tasks.subject: 3.7 Initial Key Heights (Venting)
template_tasks.description: Set venting per A-clarinet spec; trim stops.

template_tasks.subject: 3.8 Airtightness (Post-Mechanical)
template_tasks.description: Comprehensive leak test after mechanics/pads/regulation.

template_tasks.subject: 4.1 Pitch Curve (Baseline)
template_tasks.description: Measure cent deviation across full range; capture environment & setup.

template_tasks.subject: 4.2 Voicing & Micro-Adjust
template_tasks.description: Iterative key-height/pad/undercut micro-adjust to targets.

template_tasks.subject: 4.3 Response & Articulation Validation
template_tasks.description: Attacks pp–ff; register transitions; throat/altissimo stability.

template_tasks.subject: 4.4 Iteration / Lock Targets
template_tasks.description: Converge and lock final regulation and acoustic targets.

template_tasks.subject: 5.1 Airtightness (Final QA)
template_tasks.description: Final documented airtightness to shop standard.

template_tasks.subject: 5.2 Functional QA (Cycle Test)
template_tasks.description: Cycle keys (e.g., 50x); verify rebound, silence, regulation stability.

template_tasks.subject: 5.3 Play-Test Sign-Off
template_tasks.description: Holistic musical test; final technician sign-off.

template_tasks.subject: 5.4 Documentation Pack
template_tasks.description: Photos; measurements; pitch map; care guide; warranty.

template_tasks.subject: 5.5 Certificate of Acoustic Performance
template_tasks.description: Generate and attach certificate; QA manager sign-off.

template_tasks.subject: 6.1 Client Handover & Demo
template_tasks.description: Demonstrate results; review measured outcomes and characteristics.

template_tasks.subject: 6.2 Care & Break-In Guide
template_tasks.description: Provide care + break-in guidance for pads and humidity control.

template_tasks.subject: 6.3 Follow-Up Check Booking
template_tasks.description: Schedule post-break-in check; set reminders.

template_tasks.subject: C1 Tool Calibration Log (Pre-Work Check)
template_tasks.description: Verify calibration status (spring gauge, feelers, manometer, calipers).

template_tasks.subject: C2 Materials & Lot Tracking
template_tasks.description: Record lot/batch numbers for corks, pads, adhesives, oils; link to work order.

template_tasks.subject: C3 Audit Sampling (1-in-10) Post-Delivery
template_tasks.description: Random post-delivery QA sampling; document findings and corrective actions.
